entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain or freezing rain beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain or ice pellets after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
